name: Raboot
description: Its thick and fluffy fur protects it from the cold and enables it to use hotter fire moves.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use.
